GR14brhms5cu:9: vicāre tu mamātra syād ṛṣīṇāṃ sa ṛṣir gatiḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:10: yadyapy adhyāya-śata-yuk saṃhitā sā tathāpy asau |
GR14brhms5cu:13: tad evātra parāmṛṣṭaṃ tato hṛṣṭaṃ mano mama ||
GR14brhms5cu:15: atra tat punar āmṛśya vyākhyātuṃ spṛśyate mayā ||
GR14brhms5cu:16: atha śrīmad-bhāgavate yad uktaṃ ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam [BhP 1.3.28] iti tad eva prathamam āha īśvara iti |
GR14brhms5cu:17: atra kṛṣṇa ity eva viśeṣya tan-nāmaiva |
GR14brhms5cu:22: tan-nāma-vargāvirbhāva-kṛtā gargeṇa prathamam uddiṣṭatvena tathā yaṃ mantram adhikṛtya so'yam ārambhaḥ tatrāgrataḥ paricitatvena mūla-rūpatvāt
GR14brhms5cu:24: śrī-bhagavad-uktau - nāmnāṃ mukhyatamaṃ nāma kṛṣṇākhyaṃ me parantapa iti |
GR14brhms5cu:26: sahasra-nāmnāṃ puṇyānāṃ trir-āvṛttyā tu yat phalam |
GR14brhms5cu:27: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tat prayacchati ||
GR14brhms5cu:28: ity atra śrī-kṛṣṇasyety evoktaṃ yat tv agre govinda-nāmnā stoṣyate tat khalu
GR14brhms5cu:30: tad evaṃ rūḍhitvena prādhānyāt tasya iśvara ity ādīni viśeṣaṇāni |
GR14brhms5cu:34: āsan varṇās trayo hy asya gṛhṇato 'nuyugaṃ tanūḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:35: śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:36: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te |
GR14brhms5cu:37: guṇa-karmānurūpāṇi tānya ahaṃ veda no janāḥ || [BhP 10.8.13-14]
GR14brhms5cu:39: asya kṛṣṇatvena dṛśyamānasya prati-yugaṃ tanūr nānāvatārān gṛhṇataḥ prakāśyataḥ śuklādayas trayo āsan prakāśam avāpuḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:40: sa ca sa ca śuklādir avatāra idānīṃ sākṣād asyāvatāra-samaye kṛṣṇāṅgataḥ etasminn evāntarbhūtaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:41: ataiva kṛṣṇe kartṛtvāt sarvotkarṣakatvāt kṛṣṇa iti mukhyaṃ nāma |
GR14brhms5cu:42: tasmād asyaiva tāni rūpāṇīty āha bahūnīti |
GR14brhms5cu:44: tan-nāmni prādhyānya-sūcakasya kṛṣṇasya tan-nāmnaḥ prādhānye labdhe -
GR14brhms5cu:45: kṛṣir bhū-vācakaḥ śabdo ṇaś ca nirvṛtivācakaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:46: tayor aikyaṃ paraṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate ||
GR14brhms5cu:49: tad-upāsanā-tantra-gautamīya-tantre aṣṭādaśākṣara-vyākhyāyāṃ tad etat tulyaṃ padyaṃ dṛśyate
GR14brhms5cu:52: tasmād ayam arthaḥ - bhavanty asmāt sarve'rthā iti bhūḥ dhātv-artha ucyate
GR14brhms5cu:53: bhāva-śadavat sa cātra karṣter evārthas tasyaiva prāptatvāt |
GR14brhms5cu:57: sattā-vācakam ity ukte ghaṭa-sattaiva gamyate na tu paṭa-sattā na vā sāmānya-satteti |
GR14brhms5cu:58_0: atha nivṛttir ānandas tayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyaktaṃ yat paraṃ brahma sarvato'pi sarvasyāpi bṛṃhaṇaṃ vastu tat bṛhattamaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:58_1: kṛṣṇa ity abhidhīyate kintu kṛṣer ākarṣa-mātrārthatvena ṇa-śabdasya ca pratipādyenānandena saha sāmānādhikaraṇyāsambhavād
GR14brhms5cu:61: brahma-śabdasya tat-tad-arthatvaṃ ca bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tad brahma
GR14brhms5cu:65: sattā-svānandayor yogāt cit paraṃ brahma cocyate || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:66: advaya-vādibhir api sattānandayor aikyaṃ tathā mantavyam |
GR14brhms5cu:69: pravṛtti-hetur yat paramaṃ sa tad evocyate |
GR14brhms5cu:70: sad eva saumyedam agra āsīd [Chā 6.2.1] iti śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:76: uttarārdhe yasmād evaṃ sarvākarṣaka-sukha-rūpo'sau tasmād ātmā jīvaś ca tatra sukha-rūpo bhavet |
GR14brhms5cu:78: tad evaṃ svarūpa-guṇābhyāṃ parama-bṛhattamaḥ sarvākarṣaka ānandaḥ kṛṣṇa-śabda-vācya iti jñeyam |
GR14brhms5cu:79: sa ca śabdaḥ śrī-devakīnandana eva rūḍhaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:88: iti para-brahmatvaṃ ca śrīmad-bhāgavate gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:89: manuṣya-liṅgam [BhP 7.15.58] iti, yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma
GR14brhms5cu:91: śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇe - yatrāvatīrṇaṃ kṛṣṇākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma narākṛti [ViP 4.11.2] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:94: śrī-gopāla-tāpanīṣu ca yo'sau paraṃ brahma gopālaḥ iti |
GR14brhms5cu:96: yasmād eva tādṛk kṛṣṇa-śabda-vācyas tasmād īśvaraḥ sarva-vaśāyitā |
GR14brhms5cu:100: kāla-rūpeṇa bhagavān tenāyaṃ kṛṣṇa ucyate || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:102: tathā ca tṛtīye tam uddiśoddhavasya pūrṇa eva nirṇayaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:107: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat [Gītā 10.42] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:109: śrī-gopāla-tāpanyām-eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ [GTU 1.19] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:121: atraivāgre vakṣyate - śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ [BrahmaS
GR14brhms5cu:123: tāpanyāṃ ca -kṛṣṇo vai paramaṃ daivatam [GTU 1.3] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:124: yasmād eva tādṛk paramas tasmād ādiś ca |
GR14brhms5cu:127: āhopāyaṃ tam evādya uddhavo yam uvāca ha || [BhP 10.72.15] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:128: ṭīkā ca svāmi-pādānām - ādyo hariḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity eṣā |
GR14brhms5cu:129: ekādaśe tu tasya śreṣṭhatvam ādyatvaṃ ca yugapad āha |
GR14brhms5cu:132: na caitad āditvaṃ tad-avatārāpekṣaṃ kintu anādi na vidyate ādir yasya
GR14brhms5cu:134: tāpanyāṃ ca -- eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍyaḥ ity uktvāha nityo nityānām iti ca yasmād eva tādṛśatayā ādis tasmāt sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam |
GR14brhms5cu:135: tathā ca daśame taṃ prati devakī-vākyam -
GR14brhms5cu:137: bhavanti kila viśvātmaṃs taṃ tvādyāhaṃ gatiṃ gatā || [BhP 10.85.31] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:138: ṭīkā ca - yasyāṃśaḥ puruṣas tasyāṃśo māyā tasyā aṃśā guṇās teṣāṃ bhāgena paramāṇu-mātra-leśena viśvotpatty-ādayo bhavanti |
GR14brhms5cu:139: taṃ tvā tvāṃ gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāsmi ity eṣā |
GR14brhms5cu:142: narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti vidur budhāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:143: tasya tāny ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:144: ity anena lakṣito yo nārāyaṇaḥ sa tavāṅgaṃ tvaṃ punar aṅgīty arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:145: śrī-gītāsu viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti |
GR14brhms5cu:147: ye ca tac-chabdena kṛṣiṇābhyāṃ paramānanda-mātraṃ vācayanti te'pi
GR14brhms5cu:149: tasmin na dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śaktiṃ manyeran |
GR14brhms5cu:150: tasmin na dvitīyatvena sarva-kāraṇatvena ca vastv-antara-śakty-āropāyogāt |
GR14brhms5cu:151: tathā ca śrutiḥ - ānando brahma iti |
GR14brhms5cu:152: ko hy evānyāt kaḥ prāṇyād yad eṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt |
GR14brhms5cu:155: na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tat-samaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate |
GR14brhms5cu:156: parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna-bala-kriyā ca || [ŚvetU 6.8] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:157: nanu sva-mate yoga-vṛttau ca sarvākarṣakaṃ parama-bṛhattamānandaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhidhānāt avigraha eva sa ity avagamyate ānandasya vigrahānavagamāt |
GR14brhms5cu:160: sac-cid-ānanda-lakṣaṇo yo vigrahas tad-rūpa evety arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:161: tathā ca śrī-daśame brahmaṇaḥ stave tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv iti |
GR14brhms5cu:166: sattvaṃ khalv avyabhicāritvam ucyate tad-rūpatvaṃ ca tasya śrī-daśame brahmādi-vākye -
GR14brhms5cu:167: satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam |
GR14brhms5cu:168: satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo hi nāmataḥ || [Mbh 5.68.12] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:172: vyakte 'vyaktaṃ kāla-vegena yāte bhavān ekaḥ śiṣyate 'śeṣa-saṃjñaḥ || [BhP 10.3.25]
GR14brhms5cu:173: martyo mṛtyu-vyāla-bhītaḥ palāyan lokān sarvān nirbhayaṃ nādyagacchat |
GR14brhms5cu:174: tat-pādābjaṃ prāpya yadṛcchayādya svasthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti || [BhP 10.3.24] ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:175: eko'si prathamam [BhP 10.14.18] ity ādi śrī-brahmaṇo vākye tad amitaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:178: yasmāt kṣaram atīto'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:179: ato'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:181: janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthānur ayam acchedyo'yaṃ yo'sau saurye tiṣṭhati |
GR14brhms5cu:182: yo'sau goṣu tiṣṭhati, yo'sau gāḥ pālayati, yo'sau gopeṣu tiṣṭhati govindān
GR14brhms5cu:186: yamunā, tad adūra-deśe vṛndāvane ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:189: brahmaṇā ekas tvam ātmā ity ādau svayaṃ jyotīr iti |
GR14brhms5cu:191: yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vidyāstasmai gopāyati sma kṛṣṇaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:192: taṃ ha daivamātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣurvai śaraṇamanuvrajeta || [GTU 1.26] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:193: na cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam asya yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vṛṇute tanuṃ svām || ity śruty-antaravat |
GR14brhms5cu:195: tac ca śrī-daśame brahma-stavānte - brahman parodbhave kṛṣṇe [BhP 10.14.49]
GR14brhms5cu:198: vidito 'si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ kevalānubhavānanda- svarūpaḥ sarva-buddhi-dṛk || [BhP 10.3.13] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:200: tad evaṃ tasya sac-cid-ānanda-vigraha-rūpatve siddhe, vigraha evātmā tathātmaiva vigraha iti siddham |
GR14brhms5cu:201: tato jīvavad dehitvaṃ tasya nety api siddhāntitam |
GR14brhms5cu:203: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām |
GR14brhms5cu:204: jagad-dhitāya so'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā || [BhP 10.14.55] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:206: māyā dambhe kṛpāyāṃ ca iti viśva-prakāśaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:208: tathā-lakṣaṇa-śrī-kṛṣṇa-rūptave siddhe cobhaya-līlābhiniviṣṭatvena kvacid vṛṣṇīndratvaṃ kvacid govindatvaṃ ca dṛśyate |
GR14brhms5cu:214: tad evam api svābhīṣṭa-rūpa-līlā-parikara-viśiṣṭatayā govindatvam eva svārādhyatvena yojayati govinda iti |
GR14brhms5cu:217: abhiṣekānte govinda iti cābhyadhāt [BhP 10.27.23] ity uktvā tat prakaraṇārambhe śrī-śuka-prārthanā
GR14brhms5cu:218: prīyān na indro gavām [BhP 10.26.25] iti gavāṃ sarvāśrayatvād
GR14brhms5cu:222: gobhyo yajñāḥ pravartante gobhyo devāḥ samutthitāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:224: astu tāvat parama-golokāvatīrṇānāṃ tāsāṃ gavām indratvam iti tāpanīṣu ca
GR14brhms5cu:225: brahmaṇā tadīyam eva svenārādhanaṃ prakāśitam -- govindaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:229: tathaiva daśame -- tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyām [BhP 10.14.34] ity ādi, śrī-nanda-nandanatvenaiva ca taṃ labdhuṃ prārthanā
GR14brhms5cu:230: naumīḍya te'bhra-vapuṣe taḍid-ambarāya ity ādi paśupāṅgajāya [BhP 10.14.1] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:232: tad evaṃ govinda-śabdasya nānā-pāramaiśvarya-mayy anyārthatāpi tena nābhimatā |
GR14brhms5cu:240: anayor vallabhaḥ proktaḥ svāmī kṛṣṇākhya īśvaraḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:244: prakṛtim iti māyākhyāṃ jagat-kāraṇa-śaktim ity arthaḥ tattva-samūhako
GR14brhms5cu:246: anayor āśrayaḥ sāndrānandaṃ paraṃ jyotir īśvarao
GR14brhms5cu:249: prakṛtir iti svarūpa-bhūtā māyātītā vaikuṇṭhādau prakāśamānā
GR14brhms5cu:253: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GR14brhms5cu:255: tad evam atrāpi nanda-nandanatvam evābhimataṃ śrī-gargeṇa ca yathoktam |
GR14brhms5cu:256: prāg ayaṃ vāsudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:257: ātmajatvaṃ hi tasya śrī-vasudevasyāpi manasy āvirbhūtatvam evābhimatam |
GR14brhms5cu:260: api dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:265: pūrvāvyavahita-kālaṃ vyāpya tathā tathā sarvatra darśanāt |
GR14brhms5cu:266: kintv ātmani tasyāvirbhāve saty apy ātmajatvāya pitṛ-bhāva-maya-śuddha-mahā-premaiva
GR14brhms5cu:268: brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād varāha-devasyāvirbhāve'pi parasparaṃ tathā bhāva-darśanābhāvāt |
GR14brhms5cu:278: pratibandhakaṃ iti sādhūktaṃ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya iti |
GR14brhms5cu:279: atha śrī-śukadevena tathaiva nirṇītaṃ nāyaṃ sukhāpo bhagavān dehināṃ
GR14brhms5cu:285: atha viśeṣaḥ śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇyāṃ nandas tv ātmaja
GR14brhms5cu:289: atha tasya tad-rūpatā-sādhakaṃ nityaṃ dhāma pratipādayati sahasra-patraṃ
GR14brhms5cu:296: mahā-bhagavato vā padaṃ mahā-vaikuṇṭhādi-rūpaṃ ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:297: rūḍhir yogam apaharatīti nyāyena tasyaiva pratīteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:299: bhagavān gokuleśvaraḥ iti śīlārthe tv atra varac-pratyayaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:301: tad eva cāmnātaṃ gokulaṃ vana-vaikuṇṭham iti |
GR14brhms5cu:303: śrī-nanda-yaśodādibhiḥ saha vāsa-yogyaṃ mahāntaḥ-puraṃ taiḥ sahavāsitātvagre samuddekṣyate
GR14brhms5cu:315: mukhya-pīṭham idam ity āha karṇikāram iti dvayena |
GR14brhms5cu:317: yat prakṛtir eva sarvatra mantratvena pūjārthaṃ likhyate ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:318: yantram eva darśayati ṣaṭ-koṇā abhyantare yasya tat |
GR14brhms5cu:324: yasyāḥ sā ṣaṭ-padī śrīmad-aṣṭādaśākṣarī tasyāḥ sthānam |
GR14brhms5cu:325: prakṛtir mantrasya svarūpaṃ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ, kāraṇa-rūpatvāt |
GR14brhms5cu:326: tac coktam ṛṣy-ādi-smaraṇe - kṛṣṇaḥ prakṛtir iti |
GR14brhms5cu:343: vāyur yathaiko bhuvanaṃ praviṣṭo janye janye pañca-rūpo babhūva |
GR14brhms5cu:346: kvacid durgāyā adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śakti-śaktimator abheda-vivakṣayā yathā ca bṛhad-gautamīye
GR14brhms5cu:347: rādhā durgā śivā durgā lakṣmī durgā prakīrtitā |
GR14brhms5cu:350: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saiva durgā syād yā durgā kṛṣṇa eva saḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:351: anayor antarādarśī saṃsārān no vimucyate || ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:352: ataḥ svayam eva śrī-kṛṣṇas tatra svarūpa-śakti-rūpeṇa durgā nāmeti |
GR14brhms5cu:354: niruktiś cātra kṛcchreṇa durgārādhanādi bahu-prayāsena gamyate jñāyate iti |
GR14brhms5cu:356: jānāty ekā parā-kāntaṃ saiva durgā tad-ātmikā |
GR14brhms5cu:359: muhūrtād eva devasya prāptir bhavati nānyathā ||
GR14brhms5cu:366: yayā mugdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sarva-dehābhimānataḥ || iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:367: tathā ca sammohana-tantre jayāṃ prati śrī-durgā-vacanaṃ -
GR14brhms5cu:368: yan nāmnā nāmnī durgāhaṃ guṇair guṇavatī hy aham |
GR14brhms5cu:369: yad-vaibhavā mahā-lakṣmī rādhā nityāparā dvayā || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:370: kiṃ ca prema-rūpā ye ānanda-mahānanda-rasās tat paripāka-bhedās
GR14brhms5cu:371: tad-ātmakena tathā jyotī-rūpeṇa sva-prakāśakena manunā mantra-rūpeṇa
GR14brhms5cu:372: kāma-bījena saṅgatam iti mūlāntargatatve'pi kāma-bījasya pṛthag-uktiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:374: tat-kiñjalkaṃ tad-aṃśānāṃ tat-patrāṇi śriyām api ||4|| // BrS_5.5 //
GR14brhms5cu:375: tad evaṃ tad-dhāmoktvā tad-āvaraṇāny āha tad ity ardhena |
GR14brhms5cu:378: tac ca tad-aṃśānāṃ tasminn aṃśodāyo vidyate yeṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:383: viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ || [BhP 10.36.15] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:384: kaṃsa-vadhānte śrī-vraja-rājaṃ prati svayaṃ bhagavatā - jñātīn vo draṣṭum
GR14brhms5cu:386: ataiva kamalasya patrāṇi śriyāṃ tat-preyasīnāṃ gopī-rūpāṇāṃ śrī-rādhādīnām upavana-rūpāṇi
GR14brhms5cu:391: sarva-lakṣmī-mayī sarva-kāntiḥ sammohinī parā || iti bṛhad-gautamīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:393: rukmiṇī dvāravatyāṃ tu rādhā vṛndāvane vane || iti matsya-purāṇāt |
GR14brhms5cu:398: tatra patrāṇām ucchrita-prāntānāṃ vartmāṇy agrima-sandhiṣu tu goṣṭhāni jñeyāni |
GR14brhms5cu:399: akhaṇḍa-kamalasya gokulatvāt tathaiva gokula-samāveśāc ca goṣṭhaṃ tathaiva
GR14brhms5cu:401: sahasrāraṃ padmaṃ dala-tatiṣu devībhir abhitaḥ parīto go-saṅghair api nikhila-kiñjalka-militaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:403: prabhāvaḥ satyaḥ śrī-parama-puruṣas taṃ kila bhaje || iti padma-bīja-koṣe
GR14brhms5cu:405: tatra go-saṅkhyair iti tu pāṭhaḥ samañjasaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:410: prakaṭitaḥ prabhāvaḥ yena saḥ parama-puruṣaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ ||4||
GR14brhms5cu:413: caturbhiḥ puruṣārthaiś ca caturbhir hetubhir vṛtam |
GR14brhms5cu:414: śūlair daśabhir ānaddham ūrdhvādho dig-vidikṣv api || // BrS_5.7 //
GR14brhms5cu:415: aṣṭabhir nidhibhir juṣṭam aṣṭabhiḥ siddhibhis tathā
GR14brhms5cu:416: manu-rūpaiś ca daśabhir dik-pālaiḥ parito vṛtam || // BrS_5.8 //
GR14brhms5cu:417: śyāmair gauraiś ca raktaiś ca śuklaiś ca pārṣadarṣabhaiḥ śobhitaṃ śaktibhis tābhir adbhutābhiḥ samantataḥ ||5|| // BrS_5.9 //
GR14brhms5cu:418: atha gokulāvaraṇāny āha caturasram iti caturbhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:419: tasya gokulasya bahiḥ sarvataś caturasraṃ catuṣkoṇātmakaṃ sthānaṃ śvetadvīpākhyam |
GR14brhms5cu:420: tad etad upalakṣaṇaṃ golokākhyaṃ cety arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:421: yadyapi gokule śvetadvīpatvam asty eva tad-avāntara-bhūmimayatvāt |
GR14brhms5cu:422: tathāpi viśeṣa-nāmnoktatvāt tenaiva tat pratīyate iti tathoktam |
GR14brhms5cu:426: tatra-viśuddhātmā idaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa ca ity ādikam uktvā tan-madhye
GR14brhms5cu:427: vṛndāvanaṃ kusumitaṃ nānā-vṛkṣa-vihaṅgamaṃ saṃsmaret ity uktam |
GR14brhms5cu:428: tathā ca bṛhad-vāmane śrutīnāṃ prārthanā pūrvakāṇi padyāni
GR14brhms5cu:429: ānanda-mātram iti yad vadanti hi purāvidaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:430: tad-rūpe darśayāsmākaṃ yadi deyo varo hi naḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:431: śrutvaitad darśayāmāsa svaṃ lokaṃ prakṛteḥ param |
GR14brhms5cu:433: yatra vṛndāvanaṃ nāma vanaṃ kāma-dughair drumaiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:434: manorama-nikuñjāḍhyaṃ sarvartu-sukha-saṃyutam || ity ādi tac ca caturasram |
GR14brhms5cu:437: kintu deva-līlatvāt tad-upari-vyoma-yāna-sthā eva jñeyā hetubhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:442: śyāmādayaḥ catvāro vedāḥ tair ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:443: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ iti daśamāt |
GR14brhms5cu:445: tad evaṃ goloka-nāmā ayaṃ lokaḥ śrī-bhāgavate sādhitaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:447: kṛṣṇe ca sannatiṃ teṣāṃ jñātibhyo vismito 'bravīt ||
GR14brhms5cu:448: te cautsukya-dhiyo rājan matvā gopās tam īśvaram |
GR14brhms5cu:449: api naḥ svagatiṃ sūkṣmām upādhāsyad adhīśvaram ||
GR14brhms5cu:450: iti svānāṃ sa bhagavān vijñāyākhila-dṛk svayam |
GR14brhms5cu:453: uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman ||
GR14brhms5cu:455: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param ||
GR14brhms5cu:456: satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam |
GR14brhms5cu:457: yad dhi paśyanti munayo guṇāpāye samāhitāḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:458: te tu brahma-hradaṃ nītā magnāḥ kṛṣṇena coddhṛtāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:461: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ || [BhP 10.28.10-17] iti
GR14brhms5cu:470: ity ādi padye janā itivad ubhayatrāpy anya-janatvam aprastutatam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:471: vraja-janasya tu tadīya-svajanatamatvaṃ tena svayam eva vibhāvitam -
GR14brhms5cu:473: gopāye svātma-yogena so'yaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ || [BhP 10.25.18] ity anena |
GR14brhms5cu:474: sa etasmin prāpañcike loke avidyābhir yā uccāvacā deva-tiryag-ādi-rūpā
GR14brhms5cu:475: gatayas tāsu svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman tan-miśratayābhivyakteḥ tan-nirviśeṣatayā
GR14brhms5cu:476: jānan, tām eva svāṃ gatiṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ madīya-laukika-līlāveśena
GR14brhms5cu:484: ataiva saccidānanda-rūpa evāsau loka ity āha satyam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:485: atha śrī-vṛndāvane tādṛśa-darśanaṃ katama-deśa-sthitānāṃ teṣām ity ata
GR14brhms5cu:487: brahma-hradaṃ akrūra-tīrthaṃ kṛṣṇena nītā punaś ca tenaiva magnāḥ majjitāḥ punaś ca tasmāt tenaivoddhṛtāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:488: uddhṛtya punaḥ sva-sthāna-prāpitāḥ santo, brahmaṇaḥ parama-bṛhattamasya tasyaiva lokaṃ golokākhyaṃ dadṛśuḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:495: purā purāṇe nikaṭe prabandhātīta-bhāviṣu iti koṣa-kārāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:496: seyaṃ ca paripāṭī tat tīrthaṃ mahimānaṃ lakṣyam eva vidhātum iti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:497: tatra svāṃ gatim iti tadīyatā-nirdeśo gopānāṃ svaṃ lokam iti ṣaṣṭhī-sva-śabdayor
GR14brhms5cu:499: kṛṣṇam iti sākṣān-nirdeśaś ca vaikuṇṭhāntaraṃ vyavacchidya
GR14brhms5cu:503: tatra soma-gatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām ||
GR14brhms5cu:504: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi |
GR14brhms5cu:505: sa hi sarva-gataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśa-gato mahān ||
GR14brhms5cu:506: upary upari tatrāpi gatis tava tapomayī |
GR14brhms5cu:507: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham |
GR14brhms5cu:509: brāhmye tapasi yuktānāṃ brahma-lokaḥ parā gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:510: gavām eva tu yo loko durāroho hi sā gatiḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:511: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā |
GR14brhms5cu:512: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighantopdadravān gavām || [HV 2.19.29-35] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:513: tatrāpāta-pratītārthāntare svargād ūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇo loka ity ayuktaṃ syāt
GR14brhms5cu:515: tatra soma-gatiś caivety api na sambhavati candrasyānyeṣām api jyotiṣāṃ dhruva-lokādhastād eva gateḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:516: tatra sādhyās taṃ pālayantīty api nopapadyate |
GR14brhms5cu:521: surabhi-lokatve sati sarva-gata ity anupapannaṃ syāt |
GR14brhms5cu:522: śrī-bhagavad-vigraha-lokayor acintya-śaktitvena vibhutvaṃ ghaṭate na punar asyeti |
GR14brhms5cu:523: ataiva sarvātītatvāt tatrāpi tava gatir ity api śabdo vismaye prayuktaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:524: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve ity-ādikaṃ coktam |
GR14brhms5cu:525: tasmāt prākṛta-golokād anya evāsau goloka iti siddham |
GR14brhms5cu:528: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam || [Mbh 12.330.68] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:532: iti dvitīyānusāreṇa svar-lokam ārabhya satya-loka-paryantaṃ loka-pañcakam
GR14brhms5cu:534: tasmād ūrdhvam upari brahma-loko brahmātmako loko brahma-lokaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:538: satya-lokas tu brahma-lokaḥ sanātanaḥ [BhP 2.5.38] iti dvitīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:553: tatra brahma-loke umayā saha vartata iti somaḥ śrī-śivas tasya gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:554: sva-dharma-niṣṭhaḥ śata-janmabhiḥ pumān viriñcatām eti tataḥ paraṃ hi mām |
GR14brhms5cu:555: avyākṛtaṃ bhāgavato 'tha vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yathāhaṃ vibudhāḥ kalātyaye || [BhP 4.24.29] iti caturthe śrī-rudra-gītam |
GR14brhms5cu:556: someti supāṃ sulug ity ādinā ṣaṣṭhyā luk chāndasaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:558: jyotir brahma tad-aikātmya-bhāvānāṃ muktānām ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:559: nanu tādṛśām api sarveṣāṃ kintu mahātmanāṃ mahāśayānāṃ mokṣānādaratayā bhajatāṃ śrī-sanakādi-tulyānām ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:561: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune || [BhP 6.14.5] iti ṣaṣṭhāt |
GR14brhms5cu:563: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ || [Gītā 6.47] iti gītābhyaś ca |
GR14brhms5cu:566: sarvordhva-pradeśe gavāṃ lokaḥ śrī-goloka ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:567: taṃ ca golokaṃ sādhyāḥ prāpañcika-devānāṃ prasādhanīyā mūla-rūpā
GR14brhms5cu:568: nitya-tadīya-deva-gaṇāḥ pālayanti dik-pālatayā vartante te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ [Rk 10.90.16] iti śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:569: tatra pūrve ye ca sādhyā viśve devāḥ sanātanāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:570: te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacantaḥ śubha-darśanāḥ || iti
GR14brhms5cu:572: yad vā tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule'pi
GR14brhms5cu:573: [BhP 10.14.34] iti śrī-brahma-stavānusāreṇa tad-vidha-parama-bhaktānām api sādhyās tādṛśa-siddhi-prāptaye prāsādhanīyāḥ śrī-gopī-prabhṛtayas taṃ pālayanti |
GR14brhms5cu:590: tad evam upary upari sarvopary api virājamāne tatra śrī-goloke'pi tava gatiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:592: ataiva sā ca gatiḥ sādhāraṇī na bhavati kintu tapomayī |
GR14brhms5cu:593: tapo'trānavacchinnaiśvaryaṃ sahasra-nāma-bhāṣye'pi paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥ ity atra tatra vyākhyātam
GR14brhms5cu:597: ataiva brahmādi-durvitarkyatvam apy āha yām iti |
GR14brhms5cu:598: adhunā tasya śrī-goloka ity ākhyā bījam abhivyañjayati gatir iti |
GR14brhms5cu:607: ity-uktānusāreṇa atraiva nighnatopadravān gavām ity uktyā ca
GR14brhms5cu:608: goloka-vāsi-mātrāṇāṃ svatas tad-bhāva-bhāvitānāṃ ca sādhana-vaśād ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:610: tad evaṃ golokaṃ varṇayitvā tasya gokulena sahābhedam āha sa tv iti |
GR14brhms5cu:611: sa eva tu sa loko dhṛto rakṣitaḥ śrī-govardhanoddharaṇeneti |
GR14brhms5cu:614: brahma-lokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam || [Mbh 12.330.68] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:616: ekadā sāntarīkṣāc ca vaikuṇṭhaṃ svecchayā bhuvi |
GR14brhms5cu:618: bhakti-rūpāṃ satāṃ bhaktim utpāditavatī bhṛśam || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:620: tat sarvopari goloke śrī-govindaḥ sadā svayam |
GR14brhms5cu:623: tāṃ vāṃ vāstūny uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūri-śṛṅgā ayāsaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:624: atrāha tad urugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam avabhāti bhūri || iti |
GR14brhms5cu:625: vyākhyātaṃ ca - tāṃ tāni vāṃ yuvayoḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayor vāstūni līlā-sthānāni
GR14brhms5cu:627: tāni kiṃ viśiṣṭāni ? yatra yeṣu bhūri-śṛṅgā mahā-śṛṅgyo gāvo bahu-śubha-lakṣaṇā iti vā
GR14brhms5cu:631: atra bhūmau tal-loke vede ca prasiddhaṃ śrī-golokākhyaṃ urugāyasya svayaṃ bhagavato tac-caraṇāravindasya paramaṃ prapañcātītaṃ padaṃ sthānaṃ bhūri bahudhā avabhātīty āha veda iti |
GR14brhms5cu:632: yajuḥsu - mādhyandinīyā stūyate dhāmāny uśmasi ity ādau |
GR14brhms5cu:633: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam avabhātīti bhūrīti cātra prakārāntaraṃ paṭhanti śeṣaṃ samānam ||5||
GR14brhms5cu:634: evaṃ jyotir-mayo devaḥ sad-ānandaṃ parāt paraḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:635: ātmārāmasya tasyāsti prakṛtyā na samāgamaḥ ||6|| // BrS_5.10 //
GR14brhms5cu:642: napuṃsakatvaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma iti śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:645: yathoktaṃ dvitīye - na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ [BhP 2.9.10]
GR14brhms5cu:648: niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat-priyā tad-vaśaṃ tadā ||7|| // BrS_5.12ab //
GR14brhms5cu:649: atha prapañcātmanas tad-aṃśasya puruṣasya tu na tādṛśatvam ity āha
GR14brhms5cu:653: nanu tarhi jīvavat-tal-liptatvena aniīśvaratvaṃ syāt ? tatrāha ātmaneti |
GR14brhms5cu:654: sa tu ātmanā antarvṛtyā tu ramayā svarūpa-śaktyaiva reme ratiṃ prāpnoti |
GR14brhms5cu:655: bahir eva māyayā sevya ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:657: yad yat kariṣyati gṛhīta-guṇāvatāraḥ || [BhP 3.9.23] iti tṛtīye brahma-stavāt |
GR14brhms5cu:658: atra -māyāṃ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani [BhP 1.7.23] iti prathame śrīmad-arjuna-vacanāt
GR14brhms5cu:661: sisṛkṣayā sraṣṭum icchayā tyaktaḥ sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ prahitaḥ kālaḥ yasmāt ramaṇāt tādṛśaṃ yathā syāt tathā reme |
GR14brhms5cu:663: tat prabhāva-rūpeṇa tenaiva sā sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:664: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kālam eke yato bhayam [BhP 3.26.16]
GR14brhms5cu:666: puruṣeṇātma-bhūtena vīryam ādhatta vīryavān || [BhP 3.5.26] iti ca tṛtīyāt
GR14brhms5cu:667: nanu ramaiva sā kā tatrāha niyatir ity ardhena |
GR14brhms5cu:668: niyamyate svayaṃ bhagavatyeva nityatā bhavatīti niyatiḥ svarūpa-bhūtā tac-chaktiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:670: tad-uktaṃ dvādaśe - anapāyinī bhagavatī śrīḥ śākṣād ātmano hareḥ [BhP 12.11.20] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:673: tatra hetuḥ sākṣād ātmana iti svarūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:676: atra sākṣāt-śabdena vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣā-pathe'muyā ity
GR14brhms5cu:679: nityaiva sā jagan-mātā viṣṇoḥ śrīr anapāyinī
GR14brhms5cu:680: yathā sarva-gato viṣṇus tathaiveyaṃ dvijottamaḥ || [ViP 1.8.17] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:682: avatāraṃ karoty eṣā tathā śrīs tat-sahāyinī || [ViP 1.9.142] iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:683: devatve deva-dehā sā mānuṣatve ca mānuṣī |
GR14brhms5cu:684: harer dehānṛ-rūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum || [ViP 1.9.145] iti ca |
GR14brhms5cu:685: hayaśīrṣa-pañcarātre - na viṣṇunā vinā devī na hariḥ padmajāṃ vinā iti ||
GR14brhms5cu:687: yā yoniḥ sāparā śaktiḥ kāmo bījaṃ mahad dhareḥ ||8|| // BrS_5.12 //
GR14brhms5cu:688: nanu kutrāpi śiva-śaktyoḥ kāraṇatā śrūyate, tatra virāḍ-varṇanavat
GR14brhms5cu:691: viśva-śaktir iyaṃ sthitā iti viṣṇu-purāṇānusāreṇa prapañcātmanas
GR14brhms5cu:693: puruṣasya liṅgaṃ liṅga-sthānīyaḥ yaḥ prapañcotpādako'ṃśaḥ sa eva śambhuḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:694: anyas tu tad-āvirbhāva-viśeṣatvād eva śambhur ucyate ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:695: vakṣyate ca kṣīraṃ yathā dadhi-vikāra-viśeṣa-yogād sañjāyate na tu tataḥ pṛthag asti hetor ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:696: tathā tasya vīryāvadhāna-sthāna-rūpāyā māyāyā apy aprakaṭa-rūpāyā yā yonir yoni-sthānīyo'ṃśaḥ saivāparā pradhānākhyā śaktir iti pūrvavat |
GR14brhms5cu:697: tatra ca hares tasya puruṣākhya-hary-aṃśasya kāmo bhavati sṛṣṭy-arthaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:703: vastutas tu pūrvābhiprāyatvam evety āha liṅgety ardhena |
GR14brhms5cu:707: śaktimān ity ardhena tad evānūdya tasmin pūrvoktāprakaṭa-rūpasya
GR14brhms5cu:708: prakaṭa-rūpatayāpunar abhivyaktir ity āha tasminn ity ardhena |
GR14brhms5cu:711: maheśvaro'py ucyate tataś ca tasmin bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāpte liṅge svayaṃ tad-aṃśī mahā-viṣṇur āvirabhūt prakaṭa-rūpeṇāvirbhavati |
GR14brhms5cu:712: yato jagatāṃ sarveṣāṃ parāvareṣāṃ jīvānāṃ sa eva patir iti || 10 ||
GR14brhms5cu:716: sahasram aṃśā avatārā yasya sa sahasrāṃśaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:717: sahasraṃ sūte sṛjati yaḥ sa sahasra-sūḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:719: dvitīye ca tasyaiva rūpam idam uktam -- ādyo'vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasya [BhP 2.6.42] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:722: sahasra-śīrṣety ukto līlā-vigrahaḥ parasya bhūmnaḥ ādyo'vatāraḥ iti ||11||
GR14brhms5cu:723: nārāyaṇaḥ sa bhagavān āpas tasmāt sanātanāt |
GR14brhms5cu:725: yoga-nidrāṃ gatas tasmin sahasrāṃśaḥ svayaṃ mahān ||12|| // BrS_5.16 //
GR14brhms5cu:726: ayam eva kāraṇārṇavaśāyīty āha nārāyaṇa iti sārdhena |
GR14brhms5cu:728: kāraṇārṇo-nidhir āvirāsīt sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇātmakaḥ iti |
GR14brhms5cu:729: pūrvaṃ golokāvaraṇatayā yaś caturvyūha-madhye saṅkarṣaṇaḥ sammataḥ tasyaivāṃśo'yam ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:731: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai nara-sūnavaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:732: tasya tā ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ||12||
GR14brhms5cu:734: haimāny aṇḍāni jātāni mahā-bhūtāvṛtāni tu ||13|| // BrS_5.17 //
GR14brhms5cu:735: tasmād eva brahmāṇḍānām utpattim āha tad rometi |
GR14brhms5cu:736: tad iti tasyety arthaḥ tasya saṅkarṣaṇātmakasya yad bījaṃ yoni-śaktāvadhyas taṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:737: bhūta-sūkṣma-paryantatāṃ prāptaṃ sat paścāt tasya loma-bila-jāleṣu
GR14brhms5cu:738: vivareṣu antarbhūtaṃ ca sat haimāni aṇḍāni jātāni tāni cāpañcī-kṛtāṃśaiḥ
GR14brhms5cu:747: lakṣyate 'ntar-gatāś cānye koṭiśo hy aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ || [BhP 3.11.39-40] iti
GR14brhms5cu:748: praty-aṇḍam evam ekāṃśād ekāṃśād viśati svayam |
GR14brhms5cu:750: tataś ca teṣu brahmāṇḍeṣu pṛthak pṛthak svarūpaiḥ svarūpāntaraiḥ sa eva praviveśety āha pratyaṇḍam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:754: punaḥ kiṃ cakāra tatrāha - vāmāṅgād iti |
GR14brhms5cu:756: brahmāṇḍānāṃ pālakādayaḥ prati brahmāṇḍāntaḥ sthitānāṃ viṣṇv-ādīnāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:758: yathā prati-brahmāṇḍe tathā adhi brahmāṇḍa-maṇḍalam abhyupagantavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:760: hiraṇyagarbha-rūpa eva na tu vakṣyamāṇa-caturmukha-rūpa eva, so'yaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:766: ahaṅkārātmakaṃ viśvaṃ tasmād etad vyajāyata ||16|| // BrS_5.20 //
GR14brhms5cu:767: tatra śambhoḥ kāryāntaram apy āha ahaṅkārātmakam ity ardhena |
GR14brhms5cu:768: etad viśvaṃ tasmād evāhaṅkārātmakaṃ vyajāyata babhūva |
GR14brhms5cu:769: viśvasyāhaṅkārātmakatā tasmāj jātety arthaḥ sarvāhaṅkārādhiṣṭhātṛtvāt tasya || 16 ||
GR14brhms5cu:770: atha tais tri-vidhair veśair līlām udvahataḥ kila |
GR14brhms5cu:771: yoga-nidrā bhagavatī tasya śrīr iva saṅgatā ||17|| // BrS_5.21 //
GR14brhms5cu:772: brahmāṇḍa-praviṣṭasya tu tat-tad-rūpasya līlām āha atha tair ity ādi |
GR14brhms5cu:773: tais tat sadṛśais trividhaiḥ prati-brahmāṇḍa-gata-viṣṇv-ādibhir veśai rūpair līlāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:779: tatra yathā śrīr apy aṃśena saṅgatā tathā sāpīty arthaḥ ||17||
GR14brhms5cu:780: sisṛkṣāyāṃ tato nābhes tasya padmaṃ viniryayau |
GR14brhms5cu:781: tan-nālaṃ hema-nalinaṃ brahmaṇo lokam adbhutam ||18|| // BrS_5.22 //
GR14brhms5cu:786: samavāyāprayogāc ca vibhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak || // BrS_5.23 //
GR14brhms5cu:788: yojayan māyayā devo yoga-nidrām akalpayat ||19|| // BrS_5.24 //
GR14brhms5cu:789: tathā asaṅkhya-jīvātmakasya samaṣṭi-jīvasya prabodhaṃ vaktuṃ punaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:793: parasparaṃ tattvāni yojayann iti yojanānantaram eva nirīhatayā yoga-nidrām
GR14brhms5cu:795: yojayitvā tu tāny eva praviveśa svayaṃ guhām |
GR14brhms5cu:796: guhāṃ praviṣṭe tasmiṃs tu jīvātmā pratibudhyate ||20|| // BrS_5.25 //
GR14brhms5cu:798: yojayitvā tad yojanā-yoga-nidrayor antarāle ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:801: sa nityo nitya-sambandhaḥ prakṛtiś ca paraiva sā ||21|| // BrS_5.26 //
GR14brhms5cu:802: jīvasya svābhāvikī sthitim āha sa nity ity ardheneti |
GR14brhms5cu:807: rañjitaṃ guṇa-rāgeṇa sa jīva iti kathyate || iti nārada-pañcarātrāt |
GR14brhms5cu:808: mamaivāṃśo jīva-loke jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ || iti śrī-gītopaniṣadbhyaś ca
GR14brhms5cu:811: pramātṛ-rūpeṇa prakṛtim iva prāptaś cety arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:814: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā iti śrutiś ca
GR14brhms5cu:816: evaṃ sarvātma-sambandhaṃ nābhyāṃ padmaṃ harer abhūt |
GR14brhms5cu:817: tatra brahmābhavad bhūyaś catur-vedi catur-mukhaḥ ||22|| // BrS_5.27 //
GR14brhms5cu:818: atha tasya samaṣṭi-jīvāsthānaṃ guhā-praviṣṭāt puruṣād udbhūtam ity āha evam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:821: sa jāto bhagavac-chaktyā tat-kālaṃ kila coditaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:823: dadarśa kevalaṃ dhvāntaṃ nānyat kim api sarvataḥ ||23|| // BrS_5.28 //
GR14brhms5cu:824: atha tasya caturmukhasya ceṣṭām āha sa jāta ity sārdhena |
GR14brhms5cu:826: uvāca puratas tasmai tasya divya sarasvatī |
GR14brhms5cu:827: kāmaḥ kṛṣṇāya govinda he gopī-jana ity api |
GR14brhms5cu:828: vallabhāya priyā vahner mantram te dāsyati priyam ||24|| // BrS_5.29 //
GR14brhms5cu:829: atha tasmin pūrvopāsanā-bhāgya-labdhāṃ bhagavat-kṛpām āhovāceti sārdhena |
GR14brhms5cu:831: tapas tvaṃ tapa etena tava siddhir bhaviṣyati ||25|| // BrS_5.30 //
GR14brhms5cu:832: etad eva sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśam iti tṛtīya-skandhānusāreṇa
GR14brhms5cu:835: atha tepe sa suciraṃ prīṇan govindam avyayam |
GR14brhms5cu:836: śvetadvīpa-patiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ goloka-sthaṃ parāt param || // BrS_5.31 //
GR14brhms5cu:842: vilāsinī-gaṇa-vṛtaṃ svaiḥ svair aṃśair abhiṣṭutam ||26|| // BrS_5.34 //
GR14brhms5cu:843: sa tu tena mantreṇa sva-kāmanā-viśeṣānusārāt sṛṣṭikṛt-śakti-viśiṣṭatayā
GR14brhms5cu:845: upāsitavān ity āha -- atha tepe ity ādi caturbhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:847: sattva-rajas-tamo-guṇa-mayyā rūpiṇyā mūrtimatyā paryupāsitaṃ paritas tad gokulād bahiḥ-sthitayopāsitam dhyānādinā arcitam |
GR14brhms5cu:848: māyā parety abhimukhe ca vilajjamānā [BhP 2.7.47] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:849: balim udvahanty ajayā nimiṣā iti ca
GR14brhms5cu:855: saṃskṛtaś cādi-gunuṇā dvijatām agamat tataḥ ||27|| // BrS_5.36 //
GR14brhms5cu:856: tad evaṃ dīkṣātaḥ parastād eva tasya dhruvasyeva dvijatva-saṃskāras
GR14brhms5cu:857: tad-ārādhitāt tan-mantrādhidevāj jātaḥ ity āha atha veṇv iti dvayena |
GR14brhms5cu:859: dvitīya padye tasya eva vyaktibhāvitvāc ca |
GR14brhms5cu:866: tataś ca trayīm api tasmāt prāpya tam eva tuṣṭāvety āha trayyeti |
GR14brhms5cu:867: keśān aṃśūna vayati vistārayatīti keśavas tam |
GR14brhms5cu:868: aṃśavo ye prakāśante mam te keśa-saṃjñitāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:869: sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur muni-sattamāḥ ||
GR14brhms5cu:874: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||29|| // BrS_5.38 //
GR14brhms5cu:878: ca pīṭheṣu satsv api madhyasthatvena mukhyatayā prathamaṃ
GR14brhms5cu:883: kadācid rahasi tu vailakṣaṇyam ity āha lakṣmīti
GR14brhms5cu:888: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||30|| // BrS_5.39 //
GR14brhms5cu:889_0: tad evaṃ cintāmaṇi-prakara-sadma-mayīṃ kathā-gānaṃ nāṭyaṃ gamanam apīti vakṣyamāṇānusāreṇa golokhākhya-vilakṣaṇa-pīṭha-gatāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:890: dvitīya-pīṭha-gatāṃ līlām āha veṇum iti dvayena |
GR14brhms5cu:895: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||31|| // BrS_5.40 //
GR14brhms5cu:897: praṇaya-pūrvako yaḥ keli-parihāsas tatra yā vaidagdhī saiva vilāso yasya taṃ, drava-keli-parīhāsā ity amaraḥ ||31||
GR14brhms5cu:901: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||32|| // BrS_5.41 //
GR14brhms5cu:902: tad evaṃ līlā-dvayam uktvā paramācintya-śaktyā vaibhava-viśeṣān āha aṅgānīti caturbhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:903: tatra śrī-vigrahasya aṅgāni hasto'pi draṣṭuṃ śaknoti,
GR14brhms5cu:904: cakṣur api pālayituṃ pārayati, tathā anyad anyad apy aṅgam anyad anyat kalayituṃ prabhavatīti
GR14brhms5cu:911: tatra ca tasya vigrahasya vailakṣaṇyam eva hetur ity āha ānandeti ||32||
GR14brhms5cu:915: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||33|| // BrS_5.42 //
GR14brhms5cu:916: vailakṣaṇyam eva puṣṇāti advaitam iti tribhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:917: advaitaṃ pṛthivyā mayam advaito rājetvad atulyam ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:920: acyutaṃ na cyavante hi yad bhaktāḥ mahatyāṃ pralayāpadi |
GR14brhms5cu:921: ato'cyuto'khile loke sa ekaḥ sarvago'vyayaḥ || iti kāśī-kāṇḍa-vacanāt |
GR14brhms5cu:926: yad-arcitaṃ brahma-bhavādibhiḥ suraiḥ śriyā ca ity ādi daśama-sthākrūra-vākyān |
GR14brhms5cu:929: kṛṣṇasya tad bhagavataś caraṇāravindaṃ nyastaṃ staneṣu vijahuḥ parirabhya tāpam || [BhP 10.47.62]
GR14brhms5cu:931: darśayāmāsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param [BhP 10.28.14] ity uktvā,
GR14brhms5cu:934: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ suvismitāḥ || [BhP 10.28.17] iti śrī-śuka-vākyāc ca
GR14brhms5cu:935: anādim ity ādi-trayaṃ yathaikādaśa-sāṅkhya-kathane, kālo māyā-maye jīvaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:936: [BhP 11.24.27] ity ādau mahā-pralaye sarvāvaśiṣṭatvena brahmopadiśya tadāpi tasya draṣṭṛtvaṃ svayaṃ bhagavān svasminn āha --
GR14brhms5cu:939: purāṇa puruṣaḥ -- ekas tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ [BhP 10.14.20] iti
GR14brhms5cu:942: tathāpi nava-yauvanaṃ -- purāpi navaḥ purāṇa iti nirukteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:943: gopyas tapaḥ kim acaran yad amuṣya rūpam [BhP 10.44.14] ity ādau |
GR14brhms5cu:946: satyaṃ śaucam ity ādau saubhaga-kānty-ādīn paṭhitvā,
GR14brhms5cu:947: ete cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:948: prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit || [BhP 1.16.3] iti prathamāt |
GR14brhms5cu:949: bṛhad-dhyānādau tathā śravaṇāt -- gopa-veśam abhrābhaṃ taruṇaṃ kalpa-drumāśritam [GTU 1.8] iti tāpanī-śrutau |
GR14brhms5cu:952: vedeṣu durlabhaṃ -- bhejur mukunda-padavīṃ śrutibhir vimṛgyām [BhP 10.47.61] iti |
GR14brhms5cu:955: adurlabham ātma-bhaktau -- bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] ity ekādaśāt |
GR14brhms5cu:956: pureha bhūman [BhP 10.14.5] ity ādi śrī-daśamāc ca |
GR14brhms5cu:957: yad vā, nanu tasyātulyatve kim iti svārthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:958: kathaṃ vātulyatvaṃ nija-bhaktebhyaḥ ātmano dehasyāpi pradānāt |
GR14brhms5cu:959: kiṃ vāvaśiṣyata ity āha acyutam iti |
GR14brhms5cu:960: nija-bhaktebhya ātma-pradānādināpi na vidyate cyutir yasya sadaiva eka-rasam ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:961: tarhi kiṃ nārāyaṇaṃ stauṣi tasyaivācyutatvād anādeś ca nety āha anādim iti na vidyate ādir yasya yasmād vā sarveṣāṃ
GR14brhms5cu:962: parama-kāraṇaṃ svayaṃ tu sva-prakāśaṃ kāraṇa-śūnyam ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:963: nanv ekena kathaṃ sarveṣāṃ paripālanaṃ ghaṭate ity ata āha ananteti |
GR14brhms5cu:968: nanu nārāyaṇād evānantādi prākāṭya-prasiddhir ity āha ādyaṃ yasya
GR14brhms5cu:970: nanu jñātaṃ tasyaiva puruṣākhyānaṃ, nety āha purāṇeti yasya vilāsa-vapuḥ puruṣākhyas taṃ nanv āyātaṃ tasya vṛddhatvam
GR14brhms5cu:971: ity āha nava-yauvanam iti kaiśoram ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:973: sa eva kiśora-vayā ity anirvacanatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca |
GR14brhms5cu:974: nanu vedeṣu nārāyaṇa eva gīyate ity āha |
GR14brhms5cu:975: vedeṣv iti vedais tattvaṃ jñāyate cet teṣu sulabham ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:976: bhaktiṃ vinā na jñāyate ity āha adurlabham iti || 33 ||
GR14brhms5cu:980: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||34|| // BrS_5.43 //
GR14brhms5cu:981: panthās tv iti prapada-sīmni caraṇāravindayor agre |
GR14brhms5cu:982: citraṃ bataid ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak |
GR14brhms5cu:984: eko vaśī sarvagaḥ kṛṣṇa īḍya eko'pi san bahudhā yo'vabhāti |
GR14brhms5cu:988: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkena yojayet |
GR14brhms5cu:989: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam || [Mbh 6.6.11] iti skāndād bhāratāc ca |
GR14brhms5cu:991: acintyo hi maṇi-mantra-mahauṣadhīnāṃ prabhāvaḥ iti bhāṣya-yukteś ceti bhāvaḥ || 34 ||
GR14brhms5cu:995: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||35|| // BrS_5.44 //
GR14brhms5cu:1001: jagad-aṇḍa-cayā iti na cāntar na bahir yasya [BhP 10.9.13] ity ādeḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1002: aṇor aṇīyān mahato mahīyān [ŚvetU 3.20] ity ādi śruteḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1003: yo'sau sarveṣu bhūteṣu āviśya bhūtāni vidadhāti sa vo hi svāmī bhavati [GTU 2.22] |
GR14brhms5cu:1009: sūktair yam eva nigama-prathitaiḥ stuvanti govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||36|| // atha tasya sādhaka-cayeṣv api bhakteṣu vadānyatvaṃ vadann ity eṣu
GR14brhms5cu:1012: āgama-rītyā nitya-tat-saṅgināṃ tat sāmyaṃ śrūyate tathaiva sambhāvyety arthaḥ -
GR14brhms5cu:1016: tat-sāmyam āpur anurakta-dhiyāṃ punaḥ kim || [BhP 11.5.48] ity ekādaśāt ||
GR14brhms5cu:1020: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||37|| // BrS_5.46 //
GR14brhms5cu:1021: tat-preyasīnāṃ tu kiṃ vaktavyam, yataḥ parama-śrīṇāṃ tāsāṃ sāhityenaiva tasya tal-loke vāsa ity āha ānandeti |
GR14brhms5cu:1022: akhilānāṃ goloka-vāsināṃ anyeṣām api priya-vargānāṃ ātma-bhūtaḥ parama-preṣṭhatayātmavad avyabhicāry api tābhir eva saha nivasatīti tāsām atiśayitvaṃ darśitam |
GR14brhms5cu:1027: rasaḥ, parama-prema-maya ujvvala-nāmā, tena prati bhāvitābhiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1028: pūrvaṃ tāvat tāsāṃ tan-nāmnā rasena so'yaṃ bhāvito vāsito jātaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1029: tataś ca tena yāḥ pratibhāvitā jātāḥ, tābhiḥ saha ity arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1041_0: prāpañcika-prakaṭa-līlāyāṃ tāsu para-dāratā-vyavahāreṇa nivasati so'yaṃ ya eva tad-aprakaṭa-līlāyāṃ tāsu para-dāratā vyavahāreṇa
GR14brhms5cu:1041_1: nivasati so'yaṃ ya eva tad-aprakaṭa-līlāspade goloke nija-rūpatā-vyavahāreṇa nivasatīti vyajyate |
GR14brhms5cu:1045: goloka evety eva-kāreṇa seyaṃ līlā tu kvāpi nānyatra vidyate iti prakāśyate || 37 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1049: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi ||38|| // BrS_5.47 //
GR14brhms5cu:1050: yadyapi goloka eva nivasati tathāpi premāñjaneti |
GR14brhms5cu:1052: api premākhyaṃ yad añjana-cchuritavad uccaiḥ prakāśamānaṃ bhakti-rūpa-vilocanaṃ tenety arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1053: tena pratibimbavad dūrād apy uditaṃ hṛdaye manasy api paśyantīty arthaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1055: tad uktaṃ śrī-gītāsu - ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham [Gītā 9.29]

GR14brhms5cu:1383: surabhībhyaś ca saratīti tvadīya-vaṃśī-dhvany-ādy-āveśād iti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1384: vrajati nahīti tad-āveśena te tad-vāsinaḥ kālam api na jānantīti bhāvaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1386: na ca kālaḥ vikramaḥ [BhP 2.9.10] iti dvitīyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:1388: yathā -- sarasi padmaṃ tiṣṭhati tathā-bhūmyāṃ hi tiṣṭhati [GTU 2.27] iti tāpanībhyaḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1390: tad uktaṃ yaṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto'pi pitāmaham [HV 62.29] iti || 56
GR14brhms5cu:1392: brahman mahattva-vijñāne prajā-sarge ca cen matiḥ |
GR14brhms5cu:1393: pañca-ślokīm imāṃ vidyāṃ vatsa dattāṃ nibodha me ||57|| // BrS_5.67 //
GR14brhms5cu:1394: tad evaṃ tasya stutim uktvā śrī-bhagavat-prasāda-lābham āha atheti |
GR14brhms5cu:1398: tatra prasāda-rūpāṃ pañca-ślokīm āha prabuddha iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1399: jñāna-vijñāna-sampanno bhaja māṃ bhakti-bhāvitaḥ || [BhP 11.19.5] ity ekādaśāt || 58 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1401: bodhayan ātmanātmānaṃ bhaktim apy uttamāṃ labhet ||59|| // BrS_5.69 //
GR14brhms5cu:1402: prema-lakṣaṇa-bhakteḥ sādhana-jñāna-rūpayoḥ bhaktyoḥ prāpty-upāyam āha pramāṇair iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1403_0: pramāṇair bhagavac-chāstrais tat-sadācārais tadīyā ye santas teṣām ācārair anusṭānais tad-abhyāsais teṣām eva paunaḥpuṇyena
GR14brhms5cu:1403_1: bāhulyena ātmanā ātmānaṃ bodhayati svayam eva svaṃ bhagavad-āśritaḥ
GR14brhms5cu:1404: śuddha-jīva-rūpam anubhavati, tato'py uttamāṃ śuddhāṃ bhaktiṃ labhata iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1409: bhavata upāsate 'ṅghrim abhavaṃ bhuvi viśvasitāḥ || [BhP 10.87.20] iti ||
GR14brhms5cu:1410: yasyāḥ śreyas-karaṃ nāsti yayā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt |
GR14brhms5cu:1411: yā sādhayati mām eva bhaktiṃ tām eva sādhayet ||60|| // BrS_5.70 //
GR14brhms5cu:1412: dharmān anyān parityajya mām ekaṃ bhaja viśvasan |
GR14brhms5cu:1413: yādṛśī yādṛśī śraddhā siddhir bhavati tādṛśī || // BrS_5.71 //
GR14brhms5cu:1415: tenaiva karmaṇā dhyāyan māṃ parāṃ bhaktim icchati ||61|| // BrS_5.72 //
GR14brhms5cu:1416: punaḥ śuddhām eva sādhana-bhaktiṃ draḍhayann akāmair api tām eva kuryād ity āha - dharmān anyān iti |
GR14brhms5cu:1419: tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena yajeta puruṣaṃ param || [BhP 2.3.10] iti || 61 ||
GR14brhms5cu:1420: ahaṃ hi viśvasya carācarasya bījaṃ pradhānaṃ prakṛtiḥ pumāṃś ca |
GR14brhms5cu:1421: mayāhitaṃ teja idaṃ bibharṣi vidhe vidhehi tvam atho jaganti ||62|| // BrS_5.73 //
GR14brhms5cu:1422: tasmāt tava sisṛkṣāpi phaliṣyatīti sa-yuktikam āha - ahaṃ hīti |
GR14brhms5cu:1423: pradhānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bījaṃ, pūrṇa-bhagavad-rūpaṃ prakṛtir avyaktaṃ, pumān tad-draṣṭā,
GR14brhms5cu:1424: kiṃ bahunā tavam api mayā āhitaṃ arpitaṃ teja idaṃ bibharṣi, tasmāt tena mat-tejasā jaganti sarvāṇi sthāvara-jaṅgamāni he vidhe hi kurv iti ||62||
